DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD WATCH
DOC.TEXT: U.S. Rejects Japanese Trade Package : The Clinton_Administration firmly rejected a new Japanese economic plan , saying the package falls_short_of U.S. demands and does not merit a resumption of stalled trade talks . The standoff -- on the heels of a summit failure last month -- rekindled fears of a possible trade war , although the White_House stressed it was open_to new offers .
